title: Ep. 79 - Ryan Niemiller From America's Got Talent
description:
On today's show, comedian Ryan Niemiller visits with the boys in the studio for the entire episode. Ryan took the world by storm with his incredible performance on America's Got Talent on Tuesday night (June 4th), earning a unanimous yes from the judges to put him through to the next round. He talks about his experience thus far on AGT and how his life has changed as of a result of 10,000,000 people seeing his act. He also shares some insights about what it was like to grow up with a disability and how it shaped him into the person and comedian that he is today. It's a great conversation with lots of laughs throughout covering a range of different topics. As always, the guys end the episode with some Friday Bangerz to help propel you into the weekend. Make sure to follow Ryan on social media @cripplethreat8 and use #ClubNubb when posting or tweeting about him. Let's help him win the whole damn thing. You don't want to miss this one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and @cripplethreat8.


Episode Sponsors and Discounts:

23&Me - get 50% off 23andMe's Health + Ancestry Kit by visiting 23andme.com/HEARTLAND.  This makes the perfect Father's Day Gift.  Offer ends June 17th.  

Postmates - our listeners get $100 of free delivery credit for your first 7 days when you download the Postmates app and use the promo code HEARTLAND.

Indochino - get any premium Indochino suit for just $359 at Indochino.com when you enter the promo code HEARTLAND at checkout.
